reviews.sentence: Nice staff but the hotel needs to invest in upkeep. Courteous staff and granted a special request of having a fan put in my room. The condition of the room was poor and in need of a lot of repair.

Although I now live in Los Angeles sometimes I work in an area that would be problematic to commute from my place of living so I rent a hotel near the work site. I stayed at the NoHo Ramada for a night I wish I had a reason to go back there. It was obviously built as a Resort of some kind and it still retains that charm from so long ago. Granted it could use a little updating but if you look beyond that you can see where it must have been quite the destination spot. The staff is nice and helpful the pool is not heated but it is crystal clear and large. As a previous reviewer stated it is like having a private pool no one else is interested in a swim. Rooms are large the flat screen HD Tv was really nice and clear. I was on the 4th floor and had great water pressure. I forgot some business items and the front desk helped me out with rubber bands paper clips and printing documents. the Gym is small but looks as though it was just rehabed. I enjoyed the stay very much it was very quiet and I got some much needed rest on a very comfortable bed which is important because my day starts at 4 am.

Hotel Morning staff where not accommodating and do not communicate well. I was given a shuttle ride to Starbucks since they could not accommodate me for early check in. it is great that I got a ride while waiting for my room but what is annoying and got me irritated is that they do not communicate well to get me pick up. It basically took 1hr just pick up me for an 10mins ride to the hotel. I noticed it needed some renovation for their bathrooms. it is convenient and closed to the Airport. There are store closed to the hotel but needed rides to get there Hotel shuttle should be at least available early ride and late. since it is closed to the Burbank Airport for people traveling.

Good value. Would stay again if bathrooms get a makeover. Comfortable beds refrigeratior large closet courteous staff no smoking rooms view of the mountains. Rooms were clean and the beds had fresh new sheets every day. Bathroom needed a major update. was not able to regulate temperature of water in the shower. Extremely low water presure barely a trickle coming from the showerhead.

Not a good night. My last two experiences as I am sure your records show have been very disappointing. I will no longer rent a room without at least looking at the facility first. The shower had no volume or temperature control on the inwal valve even after I had the maintenance department send someone up. He never came back and never fixed it. The ac was so noisy above the bed in the wall with rattling I had to completely turn off the system to sleep. The whole bathroom facility was in need of repair and painting with the shower head falling away from the wall. Not in anyway representative of a Wyndm property. No bar which one would expect if not there due to a remodel then at least make the client aware especially after a hard days work and Monday night football. I would not have been happy here at 600 much less 100And remember it was a non cancellation reservation as much as I would have liked to move on. You asked so I responded John Shaw.

I would stay here again the staff was friendly a plus to have easy access to the freeway. no eat at restaurant but the bed was comfortable. The sink being on the outside of the bathroom bathroom needs updating.
This hotel could really use some attention and renovation. If the whole place looked like the lobby it had be better.

Value for dollar. The Ramada was being renovated during my visit so there was no restaurant. Rooms were adequate. The hotel is a multi story motel style model with a continuous exposed walkway overlooking the central courtyard and pool. Free wifi.

They also billed me very weird not standard billing which is weird. The bed was really good proper balance of soft and firmness for comfort and support. The showers were short it looks super old and needs renovation the elevators are disgusting and thr parkinglot is angled for a one way road but it is two ways which is really poorly done.
NEEDS RENOVATION IN ALL FACETS. PAINTING PLUMBING REFRIGERATOR NOT WORKING LIGHT FIXTURES. IN POOR SHAPE LAMPS IN DISREPAIR.
Good. Clean and new modern. Great staff and customer service. It was just remodeled because it still smelled like paint and fresh construction.
Liked bkfst included. Accessible room I had was newer and was great. Location great but see that parts of hotel still need updating to match other areas that have been renovated.
Exceptional. Rooms are bigger renovated recently and beds comfortable.
Nice Room. The room was newly remodeled but hotel was old in need of repair. And surounding area was dangerous not safe to walk in.

This place is a pleasant surprise. I loved the room as I was pleasantly surprised at the design. The bed was so comfortable the towels were great quality the couch was amazing. Thank you for the stay it was greatWhen I arrived it was very late and the parking lot was packed. Also when I walked on the elevator it seemed like it needed an update. This worried me a little bit as I thought the rooms would have the same feel. However it was definitely a pleasant surprise.
The hotels is nice it is old but rooms was remodeled smell good but little noisy.
While the room was clean and updated the rest of the property Outside areas still require attention.
